about_the_game:
Something lurks on the 10th floor of Hotel Fleur-De-Lys. Anyone trying to reach floor 10 is unable to. As if the hotel was trying to prevent the guests from reaching it. The hallways keep repeating themselves, only subtle signs are your clue forward to discover what lies ahead.

You are a journalist sent to investigate if there really is something going on at Hotel Fleur-De-Lys.

You got a tip from an anonymous source that, to progress, you need to press up on the elevator if everything is normal, but down if something is off. Doing so right a couple of times in a row is the key to reaching the room.

Good luck

About Floor 10 Anomaly

Floor 10 Anomaly is an Anomaly Observation / Walking Simulator game with a first person view perspective and set in an old Hotel. You need to be observant of your surroundings to detect changing details and run away from danger.

Play Time

20-120 minutes.

name: Floor 10 Anomaly

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 4060
